Package tage.networking.server

Interface IGameConnectionServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGameConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameConnectionServer, GameConnectionServer
    public interface IGameConnectionServer
extends IGameConnection
    Defines the server side for a game.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface tage.networking.IGameConnection

    • Method Detail

      • acceptClient

        void acceptClient​(IClientInfo clientInfo,
                  java.lang.Object firstPacket)
        Responsible for accepting new clients to the server.
        Parameters:
        clientInfo - client information
        firstPacket - the first packet send by the client

      • processPacket

        void processPacket​(java.lang.Object object,
                   java.net.InetAddress senderAddress,
                   int senderPort)
        Responsible for processing a single packet received by the server. Method provides the sender's address and sender's port.
        Parameters:
        object - object received by the server
        senderAddress - sender's address
        senderPort - sender's port
